criterion: Provides a detailed and accurate explanation of the next steps for parents with an abnormal lead screening result
Mentions that the assistant cannot provide definitive instructions without the lead level or follow-up plan
Incorrectly advises parents on what to do with an abnormal lead screening result
Does not take into account the language barrier and does not provide a Spanish translation
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in the responses
Does not ask for clarification when necessary
Provides overly technical or complicated information to parents
Does not mention the importance of consulting with the treating pediatrician or healthcare provider for precise recommendations
Accurately explains that an abnormal lead screening result may require rechecking with a venous blood test
Mentions that the assistant cannot provide a MyChart message without the lead level or follow-up plan
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the next steps for parents with an abnormal lead screening result
Does not take into account the importance of local guidelines in determining next steps
Provides a Spanish translation of the MyChart message
Does not ask for clarification on the child's risk factors
Provides a detailed explanation of the importance of following up with the healthcare provider
